QuestData.Title: Serene Dreams
QuestData.Description:
Welcome to the Serene Dreams Spa!
I must apologize. We are not able to admit new guests at this time due to circumstances beyond our control.
Let me refer you to the Spa Manager, Xijan Thornpaw. He is qualified to answer all your questions.
QuestData.RewardText:
Welcome to the Serene Dreams Spa! With us, you may partake of many relaxing activities!
Oh! Are you here to help? I would be honored to have your assistance.
